page.title: 07EVENTS BEULAH - GARTH
page.content: Mostly with agricultural bias. Beulah Show held annually since 1926 on 2nd Sat.in Sept.Keen competition,good farm -ing stock entered,also garden produce domestic and childrens' sections,and horse racing. Sheep dog trials go on all day. Mini sheepdog trials held each August at Garth House,with mainly local com- petitors including ladies. Ploughing and hedging match annually in district, April 1985 at Llwynpiod, Garth. Occasional Summer Fayres to raise funds for charities. Entertainment - occasional concerts in village halls and chapel. During winter, whist drives in villages attended by all ages. Very occasionally Theatr Powys ( travelling theatre) performs in the school.
